flavor_text.sword_shield: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The user may use any remaining electricity to raise its Sp. Atk stat.
flavor_text.legends_arceus: The user attacks the target with an electric charge. The leftover electricity may also raise the user’s offensive stats.
